title: Isn't the waiting week for unemployment supposed to be waived?
text: I was recently placed on standby by my employer due to the pandemic. I restarted my unemployment claim that I had filed earlier in the year, and did the first weekly filing this past Sunday.  As of 11 AM this morning, I still have not been paid, and my filing's status is listed as in the "waiting week." Aren't these supposed to be waived, by order of the Governor?
